message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $10,000?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. While $15,000 represents the value I place on this product, I understand your budget constraints. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $12,500 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9,500?
